body:
Lately I have not been able to decide on what videos to make, this is wasting time that I could have been recording videos. So I am making this thread for anyone to suggest some video ideas, and I will put them in a checklist. I think I am going to make a series out of this where I go down the list and make a video on the suggestions given.

Please don't suggest silly ideas, and please don't suggest the same idea as someone else!

Checklist:
- Modded Minecraft
- CS:GO
- Online Games
- League of Legends
- Runescape
- COD
- TF2
-  Vanilla Minecraft Challenge
- Trolling
- 1v1's
- Minecraft Mingames

P.S - Does anyone have any ideas for the possible name for this series. or should it just be called 'The Video Checklist'?

P.P.S - Suggestion don't have to be in Minecraft

title: {NEW SERIES} Video Checklist

replies.body:
"The Checklist"

Suggestions:
Compilation of 1 clip from each Top5 Plays. That way, you would have 5 #1 clips and then, there could be like an all-time winner based on your opinions of the Top 5 of all 5 episodes.
replies.body_tagged:
"The Checklist"

Suggestions:
Compilation of 1 clip from each Top5 Plays. That way, you would have 5 #1 clips and then, there could be like an all-time winner based on your opinions of the Top 5 of all 5 episodes.

replies.body:
Back in my youtube days I planned a lot out so here is my minecraft list:

Series to do : 1. Nebula - avicus
2. survival games - mcsg
3. super smash mobs – mineplex
4. mega walls – hvpixel
5. project ares – overcast
6. one in the quiver – mineplex
7. splegg – the hive
8. dragon escape – mineplex
9. paintball – hvpixel
10. the bridges - mineplex
11. time bomb -  the nexus
12. cops and robbers – alpha games mc
13. hide ‘n’ seek – the hive
14. the walls – avicus
15. skyblock – aem network
16. hardcore parkour – parkour craft
17. ghostcraft – shotbow
18. kit pvp
19. trouble in mineville – hive mc
20. skywars – vortex network
21. factions – arkham network
22. survival – got pvp network
I would then do mini games:
 Minecraft minigames to do 1. Spleef
2. Super Craft Bros
3. Blocks vs Zombies
4. Bow Spleef
5.  Earth Games
6. Quakecraft
7. TNT Wizards
8. TNT Run
9. Arsenal
10. Miner Ware
11. Freeze Tag
12. The Herobrine
13. The Building Game
14. Grif Ball
15. Ghostbusters
16. Build It
17. Hot Potato
18. One In The Chamber
19. Teacher
20. Pink Men Slappin on Each Other
21. Butter Slap
22. MC Infected
23. Battle Dome
24. Vampire Z
25.  Ghost Squadron
26. Death Run
27. Air Hockey 28. Four to Win 29. Skyblock Warriors 30. Team Fortress 31. Turf Wars 32. King of the Ladder 33. Jenga 34. Sumotori 35. Duck Hunt 36. Ender Games 37. Battle Parkour 38. Lava Warriors 39. Shaft PvP 40. Death Swap 41. Water Battle 42. Pig Race 43. Mix-Up 44. Skull Hunter 45. Ghast Blast 46. Mob Arena 47. Frenzy 48. Dragons 49. Death Tag 50. Bunny Tag 51. Parkour Race 52. Terminator 53. Quicksand 54. Ghost Run 55. Milk The Cow 56. Pig Wars 57. Run From the Beast 58. Dodgeball 59. Snake 60. Super Spleef 61. Mob Fishing 62. Roll The Dice 63. Capture The Flag 64. Control Point 65. Stamp Out 66. TNT Tag 67. Tetris 68. Squid Shooter 69. Bit Trip 70. Pizza Spleef 71. Blitz Survival Games 72. Nexus Survival Games 73. Bomberman 74. Minecraft Party 75. Red Light Green Light 76. Time Bomb 77. Sky Games 78. Assassin’s Creed 79. Mob Kart 80. Creeper Soccer 81. Hidden in Plain Sight 82. Musical Chairs 83. Underdogs & Overcats 84.
